com.facebook.litho.widget

Class VerticalScroll

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.ComponentLifecycle
      • com.facebook.litho.widget.VerticalScroll
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDispatcher

    public final class VerticalScroll
extends ComponentLifecycle
    Component that wraps another component, allowing it to be vertically scrollable. It's analogous to ScrollView. See also: HorizontalScroll for horizontal scrollability.

    • Required Props

        • childComponent

          Type:
          com.facebook.litho.Component

    • Optional Props

        • initialScrollOffsetPixels

          Type:
          java.lang.Integer

        • scrollbarEnabled

          whether the vertical scrollbar should be drawn
          Type:
          boolean

        • scrollbarFadingEnabled

          whether the scrollbar should fade out when the view is not scrolling @props initialScrollOffsetPixels initial vertical scroll offset, in pixels
          Type:
          boolean
